entry.title: ChileVotes on Free-Market Constitution After Years of Debate
entry.content: Voters cast ballots on Sunday as they worry about reviving the economy and curbing a wave of crime.

entry.title: Jeffrey Epstein Never Stopped Abusing Women---and His VIP Circle Helped Make It Possible
entry.content: A WSJ investigation shows Epstein continued ensnaring young women for abuse after his 2008 conviction. This is their story of what happened.

entry.title: From Wastepaper to High Art: Japan Seeks to SaveMangaHeritage

entry.title: Israel Says Its Soldiers Killed Israeli Hostages as They Held Up White Flag
entry.content: The Israeli military said the decision by two soldiers to open fire violated its rules of engagement.
